message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. We can discuss more in the next round if you'd like.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky!  Let's be reasonable. I'll take 80% and you get 20%.  Remember, the clock is ticking and the money is losing value...for me at least.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  I'll take 70%, you take 30%.  This is a fair deal considering the inflation. Let's wrap this up.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. The value is slipping away with every passing round. I'm offering you 35%, a generous offer considering the circumstances. Take it before it's too late!
